00023 QWidget* FileBuildersDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00024                                                                                         const QStyleOptionViewItem& option, 
00025                                                                                         const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00026 
00027         // if editor for file type or replace default flags
00028         if (index.column() == 0) {
00029                 QComboBox* typeEditor = new QComboBox(parent);
00030                 
00031                 // user can set user file types so this must be editable
00032                 typeEditor->setEditable(true);
00033                 typeEditor->setMaxVisibleItems(25);
00034                 typeEditor->setMinimumContentsLength(30);
00035 
00036                 // add the file type choices to the combo box
00037                 // add items to the box
00038                 QStringList comboItems;
00039                 comboItems.append("asmSource");
00040                 comboItems.append("cSource");
00041                 comboItems.append("cppSource");
00042                 comboItems.append("eSource");
00043                 comboItems.append("OVASource");
00044                 comboItems.append("perlSource");
00045                 comboItems.append("pslSource");
00046                 comboItems.append("SVASource");
00047                 comboItems.append("tclSource");
00048                 comboItems.append("veraSource");
00049                 comboItems.append("systemCSource");
00050                 comboItems.append("systemCSource-2.0");
00051                 comboItems.append("systemCSource-2.0.1");
00052                 comboItems.append("systemCSource-2.1");
00053                 comboItems.append("systemCSource-2.2");
00054                 comboItems.append("systemVerilogSource");
00055                 comboItems.append("systemVerilogSource-3.0");
00056                 comboItems.append("systemVerilogSource-3.1");
00057                 comboItems.append("systemVerilogSource-3.1a");
00058                 comboItems.append("verilogSource");
00059                 comboItems.append("verilogSource-95");
00060                 comboItems.append("verilogSource-2001");
00061                 comboItems.append("vhdlSource");
00062                 comboItems.append("vhdlSource-87");
00063                 comboItems.append("vhdlSource-93");
00064 
00065                 comboItems.append("swObject");
00066                 comboItems.append("swObjectLibrary");
00067 
00068                 comboItems.append("vhdlBinaryLibrary");
00069                 comboItems.append("verilogBinaryLibrary");
00070 
00071                 comboItems.append("executableHdl");
00072                 comboItems.append("unelaboratedHdl");
00073 
00074                 comboItems.append("SDC");
00075 
00076                 comboItems.append("unknown");
00077 
00078                 typeEditor->addItems(comboItems);
00079 
00080                 connect(typeEditor, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00081                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00082                 return typeEditor;
00083         }
00084         // if editor for command or flags
00085         else if (index.column() == 1 || index.column() == 2) {
00086                 QLineEdit* lineEditor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00087                 connect(lineEditor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00088                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00089                 return lineEditor;
00090         }
00091         // if editor for replace default flags
00092         else if (index.column() == 3) {
00093                 BooleanComboBox* boolBox = new BooleanComboBox(parent);
00094                 connect(boolBox, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00095                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00096                 return boolBox;
00097         }
00098         // use the default delegate
00099         else {
00100                 return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00101         }
00102 }

00104 void FileBuildersDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00105                                                                                  const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00106 
00107         // if editor for file type
00108         if (index.column() == 0) {
00109 
00110                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00111                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00112 
00113                 int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00114                 combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00115         }
00116         // if editor for command or flags
00117         else if (index.column() == 1 || index.column() == 2) {
00118 
00119                 QLineEdit* defaultEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00120                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00121                 defaultEdit->setText(value);
00122         }
00123         // if editor for replace default flags
00124         else if (index.column() == 3) {
00125 
00126                 BooleanComboBox* boolBox = qobject_cast<BooleanComboBox*>(editor);
00127                 bool value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toBool();
00128                 boolBox->setCurrentValue(value);
00129         }
00130         // use the default delegate
00131         else {
00132          QStyledItemDelegate::setEditorData(editor, index);
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 void FileBuildersDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, 
00137                                                                                 QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00138                                                                                 const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00139 
00140         // if editor for file type
00141         if (index.column() == 0) {
00142 
00143                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00144                 QString text = combo->currentText();
00145                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00146         }
00147         // if editor for command or flags
00148         else if (index.column() == 1 || index.column() == 2) {
00149 
00150                 QLineEdit* defaultEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00151                 QString value = defaultEdit->text();
00152                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00153         }
00154         // if editor for replace default flags
00155         else if (index.column() == 3) {
00156 
00157                 BooleanComboBox* boolBox = qobject_cast<BooleanComboBox*>(editor);
00158                 bool value = boolBox->getCurrentValue();
00159                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00160         }
00161         // use the default delegate
00162         else {
00163                 QStyledItemDelegate::setModelData(editor, model, index);
00164         }
00165 }
00166 
00167 void FileBuildersDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00168 
00169         QComboBox* comboEditor = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00170         QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00171         QWidget* editor = qobject_cast<QWidget*>(sender());
00172 
00173         if (comboEditor) {
00174                 emit commitData(comboEditor);
00175                 emit closeEditor(comboEditor);
00176         }
00177         else if (lineEditor) {
00178                 emit commitData(lineEditor);
00179                 emit closeEditor(lineEditor);
00180         }
00181         else {
00182                 emit commitData(editor);
00183                 emit closeEditor(editor);
00184         }
00185 }
